name: test_e2e_with_logs[418_NOSQL_COUCH_004]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_COUCH_004` |
| **Name** | CouchDB Changes Feed Monitoring |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | couchdb |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `_changes?feed=continuous&include_docs=true`
